DryRun.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the operation, without actually making the request, and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation. Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

MaxResults.description: The maximum number of items to return for this request. The request returns a token that you can specify in a subsequent call to get the next set of results.

NextToken.description: The token for the next set of items to return. (You received this token from a prior call.)
